scenario_text.value:
(It looks like Kaito and Dracumon are having
a serious discussion.)
Be careful, Kaito.

The enemy is stronger than before. Even if we
give it our all, victory is uncertain.

Yeah, I know that already. I can tell just by
looking at them.
But fear doesn’t help. Right?

True. Unnecessary fear can cause you to
freeze, but you need to know your weaknesses.

It’s important to be aware of them, when
those around you need help.
I know about the enemy. I’m calm.

Right.
A few days ago you might have just bolted.
Huh?
Don’t get mad!

Bit by bit, you’ve expanded your field of
view.
Wouldn’t you agree, Takuma?
Who? Me?
Eavesdropper!
(Kaito has a broader perspective?)

(What about my opinion of him?
Let me be honest...)
(Compared to before, Kaito...)
Has changed.
Still has a way to go.
Hasn’t changed a bit.
Has changed.

It’s as Dracumon said.
You’ve changed, Kaito.

You’re much calmer. That is, maybe your rage
has died down a little.

That’s what’s improving your field of vision.
Up until now, you only saw Miu.
Heh... Even so, that’d be because of Miu.
Because of Miu?

It’s nothing.
It’s not the time for that discussion.

Hang on?
Why the sudden need to change the topic?

That’s enough
Get back to searching!

(He’s pissed.
And just because I said how calm he is.)
Still has a way to go.

You have changed a little, but you still have
a way to go.
Are you looking for a fight, jerkface?

No. I’m just saying you have room to grow
some more.

If you really mean that, I guess I can take
it. No matter how stupidly you said it.
(Oops. I said the wrong thing?)
Hasn’t changed a bit.
Really? I think you haven’t changed a bit.

As soon as Miu gets involved, though, your
field of view definitely narrows.
Are you looking for a fight, jerkface?
No, no! How can I put this...?

You’ve always been calm, Kaito, except when
it comes to Miu.
Ahaha! You might be right about that!

I hadn’t thought about it that way, but now
that you mention it...

It might not be me who’s changed.
It might be Miu.
What?
Nothing!

There’s nothing here.
Where the hell did they get to?
